content:
id solution     to  fr crypt     corner
A SEQUENT        W  P  SLQJP ==> CASTE
   One,Two,Three,Four,Five,Six,Seven (first natural)
   One,Four,Nine,Sixteen,25,36,49,64,Eightyone (first squares)
   Thousand,Million,Billion,Trillion,Quadrillion,Quintillion (first powers)
   twO,foUr,siX,eiGht,teN,twElve,foUrteen (third evens)
   One,Two,thRee,fivE,eighT,thirtEen,twentyOne,thirtyfOur,fiftyfivE (nth Fib)
   Two,tHree,fiVe,sevEn,elevEn,thirtEen,seventEen,nineteeN (nth primes)
   onE,threE,siX,teN,fifteeN,twentyonE,twentyeighT (last triangles)
B LIMBO          Y  N  ULYJP ==> CADRE
C LIE            Z  Y  GRPVO ==> CAUSE
    was(new) 4,3,1,1,2(1),0,0,0,1(2),0,8,4(8)
D CRYPTOGRAPHERS G  W  YPOVZ ==> CURED
E EXPOUND        U  Q  JZLZK ==> CARED
    reading from left-to-right ignoring vertical displacement= EXPOUND
F ISLE           S  I  QTEXR ==> DOLED what four letter word sounds like
                           the ninth and twelfth letters in the alphabet
G QUIET          T  D  CIUOJ ==> FATED
     each down word is "quiet"
H BELLYBUTTON    R  T  IFCOM ==> BASTE
I MUGGLES        F  M  LMOCY ==> FETED
J MOUSETRAP      X  V  RFBOR ==> HATED
K DIMENSIONS     Q  R  LJHDJ ==> DOTED
    a sheet of paper has only two but this text gives the illusion
    of seeing three when you look at it the right way
L TELEPHONE      V  O  VZTDV ==> HATCH
M TREBEK         I  X  VZYNS ==> HOUSE
   looking at gibberish one has to guess the letter patterns
   correct text -- after all, that is the question
N HOE            B  S  NFSSU ==> RATED
bible=191*198,boggle=692*529,boole=257*144,gill=93*83,goggles=3*1793303,
googol=101287*7,highheelshoe=2*#,hoe,leghole=967*3911,oboe=55*56,
shoeless=8515*6503,shogi=293*65,sleigh=3931*125
O LAZY           L  U  YMQVT ==> FERRY  the quick brown fox jumps over
                bawl,xo,zed,fight,nova,nymphs,quick,jerk
P JOB            A  Z  TGIFV ==> CURSE      Esther What Psalms
   AndersenEnsnared,CameronRomance,CastroActors,HaydnHandy,KilmerMilker
   LandersSlander,PesciSpice,RadnerErrand,RasputinPuritans,SerlingLingers
   SinatraArtisan,StewartSwatter,StreisandTardiness,TeslaTales,TheronHornet,WaltersWastrel
Q SAFE           E  K  DREMK ==> HARRY
R RELATIVITY     K  H  AVRUF ==> CADGE aficionado,barbershop,cyclopedia,
              flashbulbs,groundwork,homosexual,overflight,subtrahend,
              thumbscrew,unshakable
S DUALITY        N  F  THFMP ==> CARRY
T SUPERCOMPUTER  H  G  LFKXN ==> CATCH
   9,12,3,10,5,4,7,6,11,8,1,2,13
U GRAVEN         O  E  CCVPI ==> HALED
V PURPLE         J  L  HPZBO ==> BULGE
W DECIDE         D  A  IVCHC ==> BATCH
      (4)^29 = (536870912)^2,
      (5832)^4 = (104976)^3,    (4761)^3 = (328509)^2
X LOVELY         M  J  TLGIT ==> GABBY  281+281=562, 561901+518=561857+562
Y VIEWPOINT      C  B  RFQEP ==> DODGE
Z INIMITABLE     P  C  PROSU ==> BATED
